import React, { useState } from 'react' import { Nav } from 'react-bootstrap' import '../styles/Home.css' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { FaBars } from 'react-icons/fa' function Home() { const [click, setClick] = useState(false) const handleClick = () => setClick(!click) const closeMobileMenu = () => setClick(false) return ( <>
POS Restaurant
{click ? : <>}

) } export default Home
